Here's some ideas I'm just dumping here:

Fuel leaks: Happen with medium-hard hits on fuel tanks, fuel lost faster in higher gravity, very slowly in 0G. Can be fixed on EVA.

More things to repair on EVA and (Hard mode) random failures of parts, some can be fixed by a Kerbal, some need other equipment/Kerbals to fix.

So basically more things that can go wrong, but more ways to fix them (Apollo 13 is a good example)

What I want to be able to do is have something like Apollo 13 or Hubble, where there were repairs.

Maybe (KAS-style) you can attach parts onto a craft to help repair it?
Suggested Zillon's of times.. People generally do not want random failures, And Im sure this is in the DO Not Suggest list.

yeah, the devs have said many a time that random failiures are a big no-no, and not many people want them(even though they are in game, unless its just my launch clamps that seem to fail the second they load).

Can I throw one in?

Transfer button:Moves a .Craft from the VAB to the SPH and visa-versa.Rotates the ship 90o dependant on where to as well as changing where 'return to' leads.

Can I throw one in?

If you make your craft a sub assembly , you can effectively do this

You have to tear the ship apart as to remove the starting piece(which may be impossible)This would move all of it making it easier for players who don't know how to edit the files correctly to build rovers and shuttles.
With just one addon that doesn't mess with your craft or persistent files, you too can move craft between buildings

Yes. hdtngf

My idea, more sounds, such as electric motor noises and other stuff to improve the feel of the game.

Yes Sal. SelectRoot. Best. Mod. Ever. Ever tried to make an apollo style mission without it? God, it's so much harder to build! (less-so if you use subassemblies).

Since this is an idea dump, here is one or two of mine:

3.75m parts. I'm not saying add them in now, but rather I'd like at least an opinion from Squad on what they think about adding this size to the game.

Cargo parts. Particularly for the Mk 2 and Mk 3 fuselages. Currently, I'm running B9 and 2 or 3 Tohou Torpedo mods to get these.

And some other stuff I won't mention here.

Just put your ideas for KSP, it'll be fun

My idea, more sounds, such as electric motor noises and other stuff to improve the feel of the game.

I`m for this. I know in space you can`t hear jeb scream and stuff but I`d like docking thumps, thruster hisses, scraping and banging if you collide with a station or similar. Also beeps like chatterer but activated by in game stuff. One could be like a parking beeper but for landing if you are IVA. bi bi bi bi bibibibibi.

My Idea is for a huge plume of smoke and flame from the launchpad and longer jets from the engines. As long as the craft itself like this. (I`m sure modern GFX cards can handle a bit of smoke and flame). It would look cool.
When you say ''Modern GFX cards'' do you mean ''Only computers with 3 NVidia Titan GFXs can handle this''?

A Titan can run Planetside 2 maxed out at triple digit frame rates. Assuming the smoke looks the same as it does now, just more of it, any computer with anything more than a $5 GFX card will work. any AMD or NVidia can handle what you see in that picture.

EDIT: I second the post previous to the one I responded to above. MOAR VFX! Also, I'd like to see better explosions when crafts fail. If my Saturn V replica fails, I want a Saturn V scale explosion, not just a bunch of small ones and a huge pile of debris. Engine effects definitely need to be looked as well.

For instance, the current support tower has to be a fixed distance from the attachment point, so it'd be nice if we could create more complex towers to accommodate larger rockets.
